Description: Body sherd of Chian Wild Goat Style or Mature Animal Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior glazed streaky brown with bands in added white and red; below, possible traces of white bands; exterior: painted decoration consisting of lion's paw to right.
Curator's comments: For parallels regarding the lion's paw with double outline, see British Museum 1924,1201.135.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0358) (phase 2)
